## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCHX8, CHX08, CHX8</u>
- **Gene Name:** CATION/H+ EXCHANGER  8
- **Description:**   cation/hydrogen exchanger family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
